message: Hi Bob, I'm happy to offer you the product for $120. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate it, but I can only pay up to $100 for the product.
Hi Bob, I understand your offer, but I'm not willing to sell it for $100. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $115. It's a fair price, and I think you'll be happy with the deal!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I still can't go above $105 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Hi Bob, I understand your latest offer, but I'm still not willing to sell it for $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $110. It's a fair price, and I think you'll be happy with the deal!
